data.title: Temenos T24 Connector
data.meta_description: T24 Connectors consist of two separate connectors: T24 Inbound Connector and T24 Outbound Connector.
data.text:
T24 Connectors consist of two separate connectors: T24 Inbound Connector and T24 Outbound Connector.

T24 Inbound Connector

The new T24 Inbound Connector is a Java-based connector that retrieves and safely delivers integration events from T24 into Mule. For more details about the connector, please contact Temenos at distribution@temenos.com for the User Guide.

T24 Inbound Metadata Discovery: T24 Inbound Connector provides introspection capabilities for T24 integration event definitions.

T24 Inbound Event Polling: At runtime, when a flow with the T24 Inbound Connector is deployed into Mule, the T24 Inbound Connector polls for integration events from T24 based on the runtime configuration.

T24 Outbound Connector

The new T24 Outbound Connector is a Java-based connector for Mule push messages to T24 containing T24 data changes or other inquiries. For more details about the connector, please contact Temenos at distribution@temenos.com for the User Guide.

T24 Outbound Metadata Discovery: T24 Outbound Connector provides an option to introspect T24 for the available services for integration.

T24 Outbound Service Execution: At runtime, when a flow is deployed into Mule, the T24 Outbound Connector will execute the service configured and sending the request received in the input port. The processed output will be present on the output port.

Please contact Temenos directly at distribution@temenos.com to use this connector.

About MuleSoft Certified Connectors

MuleSoft Certified Connectors are developed by MuleSoft’s partners and developer community. These connectors have been reviewed and certified by MuleSoft. To purchase the T24 Inbound Connector or T24 Outbound Connector, or to receive assistance or support for it, please contact Temenos directly at distribution@temenos.com. MuleSoft disclaims any support obligation for MuleSoft Certified Connectors.

About Temenos

Temenos Group AG (SIX: TEMN), headquartered in Geneva, is a market leading software provider, partnering with banks and other financial institutions to transform their businesses and stay ahead of a changing marketplace.

Temenos only creates software for banking and finance. And we've been doing it for more than 20 years. This makes us true specialists with deep domain knowledge and razor-sharp focus. We place our clients at the core of what we do. Everything starts and stops with our clients' goals – we can't meet our goals without meeting theirs.
